name: MANE
description:
MANE is a Wild lion narrative sim RPG focused on choices and consequences portraying the violent lion social structure in its ruthless unbending laws of nature on the path to rise as the king of the jungle ,The loyalty and betrayal between brothers and the extremely violent power struggle amongst the several lion families Telling its timeless tale in an exaggerating visual and romanticized lore as a kingdom medieval glory.



You're making choices as a newborn prince of "Kuanza" ; a male lion cub of a strong healthy pride claiming an abundant grass field on western region of the reserve. Growing up along you are your royal brothers: Black beard , Moon , Winky and Mhlophe. Training your skills and balancing your ferocity. Tending to your brother relationship dynamic. As your royal childhood can only prepare the princes so much for the curse of the mane, An adulthood that will inflict young male lion for a common quest to facing the trials of the wild and fighting for the food, for the pride , and for the throne.



  • A Choices and consequence driven game. Determine your lion legacy to be as a Great king of the jungle, a forgotten nomad or another victim of the war and the wild.
  • Getting to know and live through lion scientific facts on their behavior and social structure.
  • Play as a young male lion cub or one of the princes of the pride. spend your royal childhood on training skills to tending relationship dynamics between your brothers.
  • Grow a mane , Be a Knight and face The trial of the wild. Manage your lion time and resources. hunt and kill. in its quest of claiming prides and territory during your lion journey through kingdom lands.
  • Archivist : be a staff navigating your lion observation with an in-game various gadgets and interact fellow fictional documentarians.



MANE fictional world is set in natural rich reserve area where the lions reside. Lions are territorial animal. Each region ruled by different lion family. To each own have different unique characteristic and unique situation that brewing within. Listening to the roar as player lion journey throughout land. Adventure and explore throughout land to conquering and claiming. Making territory and glory of your own.

'​Thread lightly or prepare for a bloody confrontation. '​
